short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for focused work in Instagram

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Minimalinst - the perfect tool for content creators who want to stay focused on their work on Instagram. Are you tired of getting lost in the endless scroll of your feed and stories, only to forget why you even logged into the platform in the first place? Minimalinst is here to help. With just a simple click, our extension will hide all stories, feed, and user recommendations, allowing you to work uninterrupted.

Our founder, a content creator, found himself facing this problem every day. He wanted a solution that would allow him to stay focused on the task at hand, without getting sidetracked by the endless distractions on Instagram. And so, Minimalinst was born. This extension is designed to help content creators like him to stay on track and focused on their work. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a more productive and efficient experience on Instagram. Try Minimalinst today and take back control of your time on the platform

Our key advantages:

1. Minimalistic design for distraction-free focus on content creation
2. Hides feed, stories, and user recommendations for improved productivity
3. Easy to install and use as a Chrome extension
4. Saves time by reducing social media distractions
5. Optimizes the Instagram experience for content creators.
